name: wk-email-antibot
author: Emil Arffmann Hansen

sections.description: Simply enables WordPress shortcode for easily letting you camouflage an email address, hiding it from crawling spiders and bots.
sections.installation:
Do what you always do, download, install, activate.
There is no options to set – simply activate and use!
sections.faq:
How to show an email?

Use shortcode [antibot mail="your@email.com"]
This will display the “your@email.com” as camouflaged in the html, but readable for the visitor.

Is it possible to make the email clickable?

Yep, use shortcode [antibot mailto="your@email.com"]
This will let the visitor use his own mail client to send an email.

short_description: Simply enables WordPress shortcode for easily letting you camouflage an email address, hiding it from crawling spiders and bots.
description: Simply enables WordPress shortcode for easily letting you camouflage an email address, hiding it from crawling spiders and bots.
